meanings.definition: The act of removing or cutting off nerve supply to a body part.
meanings.sent1: After the denervations, the patient felt less pain in their arm.
meanings.sent2: The denervations successfully stopped the nerve signals to the leg.
meanings.sent3: The denervations turned the arm into a silent messenger.
meanings.sent4: Her denervations transformed the pain into a distant memory.
meanings.sent5: The denervations were like cutting the phone line to the brain.

meanings.definition: The process of rendering a nerve or group of nerves nonfunctional.
meanings.sent1: The denervations made the nerves in his hand stop working.
meanings.sent2: She studied the denervations to understand nerve function better.
meanings.sent3: The denervations played a prank on the nervous system.
meanings.sent4: His denervations turned the nerves into silent spectators.
meanings.sent5: The denervations were like turning off the power switch to the nerves.

meanings.definition: The surgical procedure of cutting or destroying nerves to relieve pain or other symptoms.
meanings.sent1: The doctor recommended denervations to alleviate the chronic pain.
meanings.sent2: After the denervations, she felt relief from the constant tingling.
meanings.sent3: The denervations were like a magic trick to make the pain disappear.
meanings.sent4: His denervations were a sharp solution to the persistent discomfort.
meanings.sent5: The denervations were like cutting the strings of a puppet controlled by pain.
